documents.document: I’m on middays aaaalll week long! Hiya! 👋🏽 @TodayFM https://t.co/FR16hyI1ou
@magsmccallig The nurse’s response, not the name!
@magsmccallig That is awful 😳
@niamhhassell Niamh you look so like your dad! ❤️😘
@pmcg333 Not sure if that’s safe when pregnant, pharmacist would only give me gaviscon 😩
@rachaelmwalsh Really? I’ll try that til I get to a pharmacy! Thanks!
I forgot my Gaviscon and I’m on fire. 🔥

@lilyallen @vulture This explains a lot. Had to delete the image I tweeted to go along with my review #NoShame at the request of your label because of copyright 🤷🏽‍♀️ Hard out here for a bish, I tell ya.
RT @lilyallen: Lily Allen on Her Comeback, #MeToo, and Not Growing Up https://t.co/HEMkjUSu0W via @vulture
RT @irishmammies: i m after getting an email from gdpr do i know them don t forget to vote dad toenail worse love mam x
@HomeAndDesignIE I’m really going to miss everyone telling everyone their reasons aren’t valid, or are wrong, when this is all over. Nawt!
@HomeAndDesignIE I’m confused, I thought that every reason for having a reason is a good enough reason? That’s what I’ve been hearing for months 🤷🏽‍♀️
An overwhelming surplus of diggity https://t.co/xv93EqpTdM
@hokeeffe99 Waaaay ahead of you! It’s brilliant 😂
@Poxyeagle You know it! 😂

@RosemaryMacCabe Janey Mack there is literally no pleasing some! You can’t control what others do, but you can learn skills that may help should (heaven forbid) you find yourself in that horrific situation. Fair play to him!
@jamesjcarr1979 I wear the same 5 things over and over again 🤷🏾‍♀️

I have just discovered that I have made 57 ASOS orders in 18 months. I send hardly anything back. I have made 89 orders on Boohoo but that's since May 2014 so not too bad. Cough. And I wonder why I never have any money. Oh my god.

The sunshine really does bring out the worst in playlists, doesn’t it? And we all get to hear them because, people!
I’d like to second this. You won’t meet a more lovely, smiley, gentle and lovely soul. We ❤️ Gavin! https://t.co/y4JMCD1mRL
@MeaneyThomas @Cazdoestweets I know all plumbers aren’t like that but I’ve had terrible luck!
@Cazdoestweets I’m more amazed when I see in films that plumbers actually show up! And then... they fix whatever’s wrong! Amazing 😂
And I just love Orla Flynn! (thank you Orla) 🥰❤️ https://t.co/eY8AyrvSio
@NiamhoNiamh @GrooveFestival We used to fight over who got to put in Pop’s teeth in the mornings 😂 It’s only the horrified reaction from everyone else that makes me think maybe it was a bit weird 😂
RT @oconcubhair: Dunno @sweetpmac I think you have just won your own tickets with that!

Talking weird family traditions on #EarlyBreakfast. On holidays, myself and my sister used to take turns putting in our grandad’s teeth in the mornings (I didn’t realise this was weird til everyone’s horrified reaction)
What’s yours? Win tix to @GrooveFestival in Bray!

I baked banana bread and it wasn’t the best I’ve ever made - a bit bland - but my husband likes it and brought some to work and gave a taste to a colleague and now I feel I have to bake more to show him that I KNOW IT WASN’T MY BEST WORK AND I CAN DO BETTER

@CJJM78 "I allowed". Okay. "If I got that from missus I'd be done for marital abuse". So if your wife got you a present that didn't suit you, you would be abusive to her? That's what you've said... idiot. (Also - lucky wife, you sound like great fun!)
@doalty @Deirdre__K That's today's earworm - thanks a lot!! It's so catchy 😂
@CJJM78 Colm, you're an idiot... who can't spell, type or make any sense.

@niamhhassell He really is. Imagine working that hard to become a doctor, and ending up being a leftover on Love Island. What a total fool 😑 (also, his lack of common sense/intelligence would make me run a mile if he tried to treat me.)
